website_summaries.verdict: Albeit known for its classic and recognizable silhouettes, the Triple Leather confirms that Keds is also capable of releasing unorthodox designs. The overall look stays intact with the brand's style despite some elements tweaked. Women can get the best of both worlds by still feeling comfortable despite the boost in height.
pros: An avid fan of Keds who wanted to try something new found delight in purchasing the Keds Triple Leather
A high number of testers love that they are incredibly comfortable
One also described the feeling as walking on clouds
A Keds enthusiast stated that the platform sole looks better than the thinner outsole
The Ortholilte sole is an excellent feature as said by a few reviewers
Some of the testers claim that if it is possible, they will wear these shoes all year round
One, who is on the longest hunt of finding platform kicks that provide height and feels comfortable, ended his journey with the Triple Leather
Even though the soles look entirely flat on the outsole, it is curved on the inside which helps increase its level of comfort
The thick outsole gives it a fashion edge, said one consumer
One prefer this leather upper compared to canvas
These sneakers pair well with a wide array of outfits said many customers
cons: A number of users observed that the sole must be made of poor quality because, after a few times of wear, it already started to peel off
The shoe fits long and narrow, others reported
The leather upper feels stiff and has the tendency to press on the insides of the feet, said some consumers

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for! However, I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 because the souls are super skinny. Even though I have skinny feet, it takes some getting used to. I don't have a very good arches on my feet, so it feels kind of weird when I walk. If you have wide feet, I would not recommend these. But they fit as expected (I ordered a size 9) and they look just like the picture. Can't wait to wear these in the summer! **If helpful, please click 'Helpful'** :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! was a little worried that some reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! was a little worried that some reviews were concern about being too narrow, because I have wide feet AND 5 months pregnant, but I bought it anyway. I'm size 8 and it fits perfectly! very comfy and looks cute. The lace is a bit short but I replaced it with longer ones. Also a little trick to narrow shoes is to wear thinner socks instead of thick ones, it works for me all the time.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot so I welcomed the way this shoe fit. It fit my narrow feet perfectly. I liked the toe box which gives plenty of room for my toe joint problem, and I have flat feet and the arch fit just right. I love the thick sole. As a person ages, foot problems arise, and this shoe really helped. My podiatrist even liked the shoe. He said normally he doesn’t like Keds, but this style is the exception.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Luther

customer_reviews.title: Wow I love these!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and comfortable, they have what feels like memory foam insoles! Wore them all day, feet felt great. Saw a review that they were a bit narrow, my feet I guess are medium to narrowish and the width of these feel fine. I'm a sz 5, ordered a 5, fit just right. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Diaz

customer_reviews.title: OUCH !!
customer_reviews.text: These keds were the right size and yet they hurt my heels SO BAD! - The back of this shoe is too low and slips when you walk :(
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Unless I lace them loosely, they uncomfortably press on a couple spots on my feet. As a result, when I tie them, there isn't enough lace left to tie a bow. I'm guessing that this will improve with wear. The arch support is, by the way, great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable in a couple different ways.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these shoes so much. They are so cute and make me feel less short. Unfortunately, they are very narrow (and my feet are already pretty narrow) and my my two smaller toes on my right foot hurt. The footbed isn’t that soft and don’t really offer any arch support. The stiff leather also digs/cuts into my Achilles’ tendon really badly, making them completely unwearable. I’m usually a Sketchers girl and wanted to try something new. Unfortunately, I don’t think I’m going to be trying Keds again. It’s just sad because if they had been at all wearable for me I would have bought even more in the “triple kick” style.
customer_reviews.author: Customer X

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I got had stains and dog hair so I was delighted when I finally received the right pair free of stains and dog hair! These are super cute and very comfortable. I wear them with dresses, shorts, jeans and just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Shad

customer_reviews.title: Cute- but way too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE keds, and I absolutely love the look of these; they sort of have this classic casual feel - and I think they’d pair nicely even with a casual dress. However. HOLY TIGHT, BATMAN. I don’t have very wide feet, I generally fit a normal/M and have been wearing keds since I was a kid. I wish these weren’t so tight. I’d buy them in every color. Maybe they’re made specifically for mannequins? 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe and color but need "break in" time so I just returned.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and sturdiness of shoe. A colleague at work bought them and loves them. She as well as some reviews stated that they definitely needed " break in" time. I do wear a 9.5-10 and really not certain, but may decided to try 9.5 which was too small. Didn't feel like replacing with a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C M

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: After trying five pairs of sneakers, I am glad I found this pair. Very comfortable and fit as expected, I am normal size 6 and ordered 6 and it fits perfectly. I have narrow feet so I can see why people with wide feet say they don’t fit. I like that they don’t make my feet look big.
customer_reviews.author: savagepanda

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love Keds! I usually get the flat one but I wanted to try the triple this time. Fits great and comfy. Love the leather since its easy to clean and looks good with jeans or even a dress. The shoes arrives quickly and were well packed. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: meital

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: Literally exactly what I wanted. Plain, white, slightly platform tennis. Surprisingly cushiony & comfortable! I’m not sure why I was expecting them to need to be broken in, but literally comfortable from the beginning!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t sent keds
customer_reviews.text: Okay I’m torn on this review. Bottom line, I was not sent Keds like I thought I was buying. I was sent another brand (superga) or knock off superga Im not really sure, but Supergas are actually more expensive. Not sure what happened here but I was going to send them back but I actually love them more than I think I would have even loved the keds. I would say order them but who knows what you will get! But I love them so whatevs. Wore them fresh out of the box to disneyworld.. 10/10 would not recommend. But for here and there wear they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea G

customer_reviews.title: Narrow......very!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that stated these Keds were "narrow" but thought I would give them a try anyways. I've never seen shoes so narrow! I wear a 6.5 and have many pairs of keds. These are the weirdest Keds ever. They are higher than others that I have, which is not a problem but looking at the bottom you can clearly see just how narrow they are. They were very tight feeling on my foot and they looked very strange looking down at them. Very disappointed in these shoes so back they go. I thought about trying a wide but changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: These are soooooo comfortable. I'm on my feet all day working at ...
customer_reviews.text: These are soooooo comfortable. I'm on my feet all day working at a library and I feel like I am walking on a cloud. Although it's important to note that these shoes are pretty narrow. I have normal width feet and they are nearly too narrow for me, so if you have wide feet you should probably skip them. Also the shoes strings are extremely short, you definitely cannot double knot them. But they are so cute and comfortable that I don't care!
customer_reviews.author: Wowzer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the pictures!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a perfect fit! Very cute and stylish. They're also comfortable. I usually wear a size 9 so I ordered a size 9 and they are true to size. Now if only I can keep them clean... Lol
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, needs breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneaker, but I agree with other reviews that say it is narrow. My feet are a normal width, and I had to wear them around the house with thick socks to break them in/stretch them out. Top of heel was also quite stiff (blister hazard) and needed to be stretched out. Once they stretched a bit they were much more comfortable. Nice style, color, and I liked that the keds label blends into the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8Cate

customer_reviews.title: Sleek sneakers, but way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I have, for the past 17 years, always fit in a 7-8 size women's shoe. Well, for the first time in 17 years, I order a size 8 and the sizing is right but the upper area of the shoe is SO TIGHT! I would honest purchase a half size up for safe measure. I have never had this problem before with a show. Thankfully it's not too tight, but I wouldn't be able to wear these shoes with winter socks, for example. Beautiful shoe, but shocked by the sizing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow - and I have a narrow foot!
customer_reviews.text: These Keds are super cute but extremely narrow. I've purchased Keds in the past and haven't had any issue and I have a pretty narrow foot to begin with. Also, the laces are quite short - even if you don't widen the laces at all - so if you make these even a bit more open, you can't tie them. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LGray

customer_reviews.title: Keds not the same as when I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid, all I wanted was a pair of Keds. I had several. I thought these would be fun and comfortable for work with some of my spring/summer/fall outfits. They are too narrow, and I can't wear them except with the thinnest of socks. Very disappointing. I'm keeping them because returning is a hassle and I will wear them - but not as much as I might have if they fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Stenella

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These kids are awesome I have to have a little lift as my feet don’t do well in flat shoes period. So the higher soles do great for me. My feet ankles tend to swell for medical reasons, but these I can wear all day with no pain and they are comfy. I get compliments on them every time I wear them. I also got them in White they are so good! I like that I can adjust my laces to have them looser or tighter. Hands down my go to sneakers for any style of clothing I’m wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet (10-11AA), so it can be difficult finding shoes that are not big/roomy in the toe box. These Triple Kick Keds fit great. And the 10 works great for length. Love the higher look on the sole. As a tip - I spray my keds with an all purpose shoe spray (for leather and cloth). Helps to clean the Keds (especially while ones!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite keds!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Keds for YEARS. This pair is my favorite pair, as they look great and are easy enough to clean. I am reordering and would highly recommend to any lady who wears her Keds as much as I do. They are a little pricier than I am used to paying- but they have leather uppers and look great. I think they are worth the price all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jackie Reacher

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds and really hate to leave a bad review. But....these are the strangest fitting shoe. They are slightly longer and extremely narrow and I do NOT have a wide foot. The heel of the shoe is extremely large. My foot just slipped right of the shoe no matter how tight I tied the already narrow fit shoe. I ordered my usual size in keds which is an 8.5 and I feel like if I ordered a half size down, they would be even tighter across my foot. Disappointed that I have to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 101/2 or 11 in women. I really liked this shoe so I got an 11 to be safe. It was too small :( I hate I didn't try them on right away because I missed the return window. I gave them to my sister who wears a 10 and she said they were perfect. They were super cute on her too, so I was so jealous! Please extend your sizes. It's hard out here for big feet girls.
customer_reviews.author: titispendtoomuch

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when they arrived. As other reviewers have mentioned, these shoes are very narrow and shoestrings are too short. Also, for me my heel kept slipping. Not going to bother returning them, gonna donate instead. By the way I wear size 8m and that’s what I bought. Looked very cute until I put them on!!!!! No more Keds for me!
customer_reviews.author: The Whip

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I am always a 6 1/2 but these do run larger. I wish I would have gotten a 6 but the good thing about them being a little big is that you can wear any socks with them. Otherwise they are very cute and I love the style :)
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Keds
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product! Haven't had Keds for a long time. I am short and was looking for a "spring time" work shoe, saw them and hit buy. When I opened box they looked too narrow but when I tried them.on it was a perfect fit. Cannot wait for the weather to warm up so I can use them :)
customer_reviews.author: shannon robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knowing they would be narrow, but they were entirely too small. I usually wear between an 8.5-9 US womens, and my feet couldn't fit in these at all! I literally checked the box to verify they hadn't sent me a childrens size. They were very cute and the exact style I wanted. If I decide to try these again, I would order a full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Vans!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear with dresses and they do not disappoint. Not only do they look good with long dresses, but they are super comfortable. I am usually the type that will forgo comfort for looks but with these shoes, I do not have to do that. I also own a pair of Vans and I have to tell you -- these are BETTER than my ultra expensive Vans. I plan on buying them in as many colors as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase of these Keds tennis shoes; however, you are EXTREMELY susceptible to slipping and sliding on certain floor surfaces. I was in BJs restaurant today and almost wiped out. Something needs to be done to the soles of these sneakers to prevent such problems from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kane

customer_reviews.title: a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with how comfortable these were right away. Normally with shoes like these I have to put bandaids on my ankles while breaking them in, but I haven't had to do that with these shoes, and I even wear no show socks. The color is great, and I love the platform. My only complaint is that the laces are not very long for people with wide feet. Once I've tightened the laces, I barely have enough shoe lace left to tie. The shoes in general could be a bit wider, but only for tying purposes, I don't find them uncomfortable for people with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slight irregularities pair
customer_reviews.text: Never had this problem before but one shoe fits slightly larger than the other. I figured out it was the padding inside that makes it so. Unfortunately I wore during a rainy day in New Orleans and can’t return . I do not recommend. I think these might be with slight irregularities..
customer_reviews.author: Marysol

customer_reviews.title: ? Okay
customer_reviews.text: My toe slightly touches front when I walk, I feel if I get a half size up they will be too big.. I’ll throw a stretcher in them for a day. They are also a little narrow to be a medium but not too narrow, if you’re the high end of medium you may want to pass on these. Very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: LILLY

customer_reviews.title: Great pair!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great purchase. I wear them everywhere and I’m not a sneakers girl. I even wear them with jeans and a blazer to work. They are extremely comfy and fit true to size. I got the white ones and throw them in the washing machine with some towels and bleach and they come out looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: thatgirlfrombr

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! Looks good and gives me a tad more height. My 15 year old stole them immediately, so I had to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Keds! I purchased the white canvas ones and I get tons of compliments on them from women of all ages. They are also very easy to clean -I just throw them in with my whites and let them air dry. Definitely consider these if you have a narrow foot, that's what got me hooked on Keds in the first place. Happy New Year!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tight
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes, I got both white and black. These shoes helped me find out that one foot is definitely wider than the other, as only that foot hurts at the end of the day after wearing these. I do have to tie them pretty tight at the top, otherwise I’ll roll my ankle. Personally I haven’t had any issues with rubbing against my ankles. Overall they fit as expected and I’m glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Damir Alexandre Von Rohrbach

customer_reviews.title: Not canvas material!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in white thinking they were made of canvas material based on the Q&A section where this question was answered as these being made from canvas. They are definitely not. It is made from what appears to be very shiny patent leather. Other than that, I liked the shoes, they fit perfectly (I ordered a half size down from my regular size based on other reviews). Will be sending these back!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: great tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I usually wear a 71/2 ordered the 8 I love the fit. Didn't have to break them in and cute. The platform is very subtle so if you really want that platform look, these are not for you. I just want a bit of height.. And a decent price
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Alletto MSW USC

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I was really torn on what size to get because I’m normally between a 6.5/ 7.. and I like my shoes to fit tighter typically. After reading reviews I decided to get the 7, I’m glad that I did! I could have gotten away with the 6.5 and not worn socks, but I prefer to wear no-show socks. With the socks there is a teeny bit of wiggle room still. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cute but that’s about it. Super uncomfortable and the back scrapes your heel so bad even with thicker socks. Only wearable for a couple hours at a time. No support and super narrow they hurt my toes. All around not worth the $50
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I love these and the color I choose is so neutral but yet not white so they literally go with everything. Surprised at how comfortable they were as well! i would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: angela c

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look better than they are comfortable! I find them very stiff probably because of the raised platform.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Order one half size down.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this shoe in my normal size of 8 1/2. The heel slid up and down when I walked. I then ordered the size 8 and it fits well. Definitely go up a half size unless you're going to wear very thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sadowski

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe and feel comfortable for the most part. The heal area takes a while to break in but once that happens I think they'll be good. I do think they fit a little narrow in the toe box
customer_reviews.author: C. Burch

customer_reviews.title: triple kickers
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I ordered my true size 9M and these MUST have been mislabeled in the Factory. They were SUPER narrow and tight in the toe box. Sent them back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for my narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: This is a first impression review. I just got these today and tried them on, so I haven't actually walked in them. However, so far I really like them! I have narrow feet and shoes are usually too wide for me, but these fit great. Definitely good for narrower feet. Can't wait to try them out. Will update my review if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Keds. I got them in white so I can just bleach them as needed. They're SO COMFY. Took two wears to break them in. The soles are super soft and supportive. I have a narrow and tiny foot and they fit perfectly in my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: autumn horton

customer_reviews.title: Buy ‘em! You’ll love ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are great! Good looking, so comfortable, true fit, simply awesome! I wish they weren’t white ‘cause this means they will get dirty easily, but that’s the only thing. Fully recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DeniseD

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable & causes blisters!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these once, just around the block. By the time I was halfway around, I had huge blisters on the back of my heels & when I got home they were huge open sores. I ordered several things & by the time I got to wear them until it was too late to return. I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: TenJ

customer_reviews.title: Made for people with three toes
customer_reviews.text: Good grief!! I don't normally wear wide fit sneakers. When I do it's strictly for comfort... These sneakers are SO narrow even I felt like I needed a double wide. Sent them back!
customer_reviews.author: Just Lorry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes! Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes that gives you a little extra height! Stylish yet comfortable. Used it for a long day walk and never complained. The ortholite is what makes it comfortable, its breathable and its like providing a nice mattress for your feet! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lou R

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, heel can rub blisters
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes. I get lots of compliments on them. The leather feel is fun too. It sometimes rubs a little blister on my heel but still achieves the look I wanted so I wear them often.
customer_reviews.author: reagan eve

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pair of white sneakers and these were perfect. Feels like you're walking on clouds. Runs a little big. But, would buy these a hundred times over. I was told you can throw them in the washing machine if they get dirty, but haven't tried this yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. They are true to size and have good support. I usually wear orthotics in my shoes but with these i dont need them. It took me about 15 minutes to break these shoes in. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: lisa mccombs

customer_reviews.title: Happy with them.
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great arch support. I would say maybe a little narrower than what is advertised, but I don’t have wide feet so they work perfectly. Very comfortable for putting on miles while walking. Super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sneaker. It’s comfortable and cute. A little more feminine looking than just the triple kicks. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce H Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Made just for me
customer_reviews.text: I like white sneakers but it is very hard to find the right size. Vans and Converse are both too big for me even for size 5 ... Also I only like canvas material not leather sneakers. Keds fits me perfectly! I like the design, simple, clean and fashionable especially like the cushy platform. It makes me look taller and yet still comfortable walking. Love it! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: BocaBeachBunny

customer_reviews.title: Keds Rock
customer_reviews.text: I love , love these shoes. I grew up on Keds. I bought my baby sister and I a pair for her 40 th birthday. They got true to size. We love them. I'm wearing mine alot more since it's getting warmer. Delivery was on time as well
customer_reviews.author: Lady Barnette

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly SUPER comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I just bought them because I thought they were super cute, but didn’t expect a lot of support or comfort, especially because they are platform. When I tried them on I didn’t want to take them off—they’re soooo comfortable! I’m between a size 8.5/9 but the 9 was too big. The 8.5 fit perfectly considering my feet are more so flat. I love these shows and can’t wait to pair them with a summer dress or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Soft.  Classy .Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So in love so soft size 10 led fan since 1991 .classy sneakers 👌
customer_reviews.author: delma wright

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 1/2, but ordered a size 10. The toe box is snug but have plenty of toe room, so this became uncomfortable. Not made like they used to. I had a pair in junior high and wore them out, gave these to my niece to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest keds! They have a little height which helps my 5 ft 4 inches! They are comfortable and flattering. Perfect to wear with a skirt or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: C Williams

customer_reviews.title: They’re Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t remember ever getting compliments on my sneakers before...until these. They’re so cute! I have a narrow-ish foot and they fit well (not too tight) and they’re so comfortable. Also, they add about a half of an inch or more to my height!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy, perfect for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Totally true to size and super cute! I have wide feet so they’re a little narrow on me, but I love these! I’m a professional nanny so I’m on my feet from 5am to 5pm and these last me all day and are so comfy. Will definitely buy again once these are worn out!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the laces are VERY short, so tying them is a struggle. I'll probably replace the laces. Other than that I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna N.

customer_reviews.title: Great coupled with a walking boot!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently put in a medical walking boot and have been looking for a taller shoe to even out my gait. In the past I've worn Dansko clogs while in a boot, but have found them to be too heavy and cumbersome. As a longtime Keds wearer, I was happy to come across these triple kick sneakers. They are just the right height to make walking more comfortable and I'll happily wear them long after the boot comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Poland

customer_reviews.title: Smaller & narrower than expected
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits narrower and shorter than a typical shoe it’s size. Be sure to set for a half size up if purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Q

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and classic! With some height!
customer_reviews.text: I love keds! They are so simple and classic. They go with almost any outfit. I love the classic look of these keds with jeans and a cute top. These also give a little bit of height. Being only 5'2" this is great :) They are also very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My shoes arrived this week and today is the first day I am wearing it. It feels comfortable and super nice. I do have to say that if you don’t have narrow feet maybe it’s not the best option for you. I wear a 6.5 shoe size and I have narrow feet. It fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and oh so cute!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these cute white tennies! I ordered them for a comfortable and versatile look to take to Europe this fall! Got exactly what I was looking for. I usually wear between an 8-9 depending on the shoe. I ordered an 8.5 and they fit perfect. All the other reviews talking about how narrow these are scared me a bit and when I opened them they really looked quite narrow and yet when I put them on they fit great. I consider my foot width as average. Certainly not narrow or wide. Give it a shot. Hope you love yours just as much as I do mine!
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Cute but
customer_reviews.text: Good support for walking on, however, I had to return because the top pushed down on my big toe
customer_reviews.author: GDay

customer_reviews.title: Cute but narrow
customer_reviews.text: These Keds are very cute but they are much narrower than regular sneakers. Maybe ordering a half size up would help. I have regular width feet and these are too narrow for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazo

customer_reviews.title: Tight toe area!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are super cute shoes! Toe area is a little tight so go up half a size. First pair of white shoes ive ever bought because I'm too scared of staining them so I need to find a good stain resistant product before I wear them outside!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Great color but i had to return because they were way too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jay V.

customer_reviews.title: Toe Box too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Toe box was way too narrow and I don't have a particularly wide food. Heel was too wide - I was walking right out of them. A total no win for me. Felt stiff and uncomfortable. Definitely not a pair I could have "broken in".
customer_reviews.author: S. Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Stylish sneakers. Goes with jeans or casual dress. The top lace holes are a little too high up on the foot..for me. So, I don't tie at the top!
customer_reviews.author: B. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: horrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the same size shoe for 50 years, and these didn't come close to fitting.
customer_reviews.author: frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like a bit of extra height in my sneakers, and these are perfect. Comfortable for walking around the city all day; lightweight, and vegan. Will order again when these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hersey

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking shoe with good support
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking shoe with good support, but it does run large. It was too long for me.
customer_reviews.author: camperdog

customer_reviews.title: Slips on the heal of your foot!
customer_reviews.text: The back of this shoe is too low and slips when you walk. Kept ordering and sending back until I figured out it’s the shoe design on the thicker bottomed shoes!
customer_reviews.author: JL McCafferty

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn Keds for years , but like the look of platform sneakers. So glad I gave these a try! They are super comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love it!love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, get a size up tho for toe room, I am a 6 in tennis shoes so I got a 6, and it fits just perfect. I should have gotten a 6 1/2 to for just for toe room.
customer_reviews.author: Elizah P

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the new Keds. The insole is so squishy and comfortable. I wear between a 7.5 and 8 and the 7.5 fit great. Tells me they run a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Mcpiddy

customer_reviews.title: Looked Good But Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how these shoes looked but the 7 medium was too big. The shoe slipped up and down in the back. I returned them for a 6.5 but of course, too small.
customer_reviews.author: TXL2324

customer_reviews.title: Ease of purchase was great. Gr8 seller and shipping experience.
customer_reviews.text: Loved wearing Keds ("tennis shoes") since childhood. Saw these with thick sole and had to have because I prefer leather over canvas. Perfect fit and comfort. Excellent buy. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T-Myke Q V

customer_reviews.title: I hope they continue to make this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect everyday shoe. So comfortable. I feel like I should buy more pairs Incase they ever stop making them :)
customer_reviews.author: Renee12

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My feet are somewhat narrow so these fit me well but if you have wider feet, these are not for you!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Webb

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: They are a little loose but they feel good. I wear them to work at a grocery store, and they make my feet abs back feel better than the flat shoes i used to wear. Plus I'm slightly taller which is nice. Will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Robyn-Ashley Bury

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a deep arch and trust me when I say this shoe is amazingly comfortable. I wear them all day and at times I forget that I’m even wearing shoes. Definitely getting another colour in this !!!!
customer_reviews.author: SCT

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneaks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Only issue was that my usual size was too big and I had to go down half a size. Otherwise, wore these all over Europe last summer and they were terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Domenica

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They go with almost anything, are comfy, and cute
customer_reviews.author: Morgan E

customer_reviews.title: Does not run small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7 and I ordered these in a 7.5 because of the previous reviews stating that they ran small. They do not run small. These are fitting fine but I wish I would have ordered a 7 instead of a 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: Chassis

customer_reviews.title: For VERY narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute! They are definitely meant for people with extremely narrow feet though. I am super bummed they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorRenee

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love keds! Good quality canvas tennis shoe. Very comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and Stiff
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed by these. Like most Keds, they run narrow, particularly in the heel. I found these to be so stiff and I could tell that they would take awhile to "break in," meaning lots of blisters. I was hoping these would be my perfect white sneaker, but alas, the search continues.
customer_reviews.author: aslewis11

customer_reviews.title: That not all styles of KEDS are created equal
customer_reviews.text: Must return sadly A bit short for 7.5 which is the size perfect fit in my other KED sneakers So I’m surprised and disappointed they must be returned A size up would be too big as I’ve a narrow foot
customer_reviews.author: Jaja

customer_reviews.title: Leather platform arch support narrow
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous well made shoe, generally comfortable but runs narrow. I had to return for half size larger which I never do in other Keds shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LA

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Triple Leather Sneaker
product_meta.description: A dress-up-or-down platform sneaker with the most cushiony steps. The canvas Triple platform sneaker combines lift and comfort for the best of both worlds. It can do the 9-5 hustle and the off-duty thing, pairing well with everything from tailored workwear to athleisure basics, floaty dresses to distressed denim.
feature_bullets: 1-inch platform for added height; Leather upper; 4 eyelet lace up sneaker; Soft breathable lining; Dream Foam footbed; Flexible, textured rubber outsole; Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only;
